about_the_game:
The original soundtrack for the F2P game ‘Codename CURE’ created as a value add for those who want to support our projects. It features the games main theme, wave music, bomb timer and death themes (in both current and classic variants!), as well as some additional bonus tracks which were created for and considered for use during development but never ultimately made it into the game.

The soundtrack contains 16 standard high quality 320 kbps MP3’s as well as ultra quality lossless 24bit/192kHz WAV equivalents for the audiophiles among us.

name: Codename CURE - Soundtrack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 90 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 1750 MB available space
